tasks.instruction: Read and analyze the System Design document at /workspace/docs/design/f1_system_design.md and the Original Documentation at /workspace/uploads/F1-Real-Time-Analytics-Engine-Complete-Documentation.md to gather all necessary context for the data analysis task.

Create a detailed data analysis and implementation specification document. The document must include:
1. Data Structure Analysis: Analyze the existing F1 data structures and capabilities.
2. Data Model Design: Design data models for Race Strategy, Competitor Analysis, and Car Performance tracking.
3. Sample Pipelines: Create sample data processing pipelines with code examples for each module.
4. Statistical Methods: Propose statistical analysis methods for each module.
5. Visualization Recommendations: Provide recommendations for data visualizations.
Save the complete analysis to /workspace/docs/analysis/f1_data_analysis.md.
